languages.text: {n}Идира издает каркающий смешок.{/n} "Ха! Впервые вижу, чтобы кто-то на борту говорил с сестричкой в таком тоне!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира издает каркающий смешок.{/n} "Ха! Впервые вижу, чтобы кто-то на борту говорил с сестричкой в таком тоне!"

languages.text: {n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I've seen anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира издает каркающий смешок.{/n} "Ха! Впервые вижу, чтобы кто-то на борту говорил с сестричкой в таком тоне!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I'm seeing anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"
{n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I'm seeing anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"
{n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I've seen anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"
{n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I've seen anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"
{n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I've seen anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉发出了咯咯的笑声。{/n}“哈！这艘船上居然有人用这种口气和咱们的小修女说话，这我还是第一次看到！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I've seen anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉发出了咯咯的笑声。{/n}“哈！这艘船上居然有人用这种口气和咱们的小修女说话，这我还是第一次看到！”

languages.text: {n}Idira deja escapar una risa ronca.{/n} «¡Ja! ¡Es la primera vez que veo a alguien en esta nave hablarle así a la pequeña hermana!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I've seen anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira deja escapar una risa ronca.{/n} «¡Ja! ¡Es la primera vez que veo a alguien en esta nave hablarle así a la pequeña hermana!».

languages.text: {n}イディラは甲高い笑い声を上げた。{/n}「ははっ！この船でシスターにあんな風に話しかける人初めて見たよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I've seen anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは甲高い笑い声を上げた。{/n}「ははっ！この船で妹にあんな風に話しかける人初めて見たよ！」
{n}イディラは甲高い笑い声を上げた。{/n}「ははっ！この船でシスターにあんな風に話しかける人初めて見たよ！」

languages.text: {n}Idira laisse échapper un rire rauque.{/n} « Ha ! C'est bien la première fois que j'entends quelqu'un s'adresser à la petite sœur sur ce ton ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I've seen anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira laisse échapper un rire rauque.{/n} « Ha ! C'est bien la première fois que j'entends quelqu'un s'adresser à la petite sœur sur ce ton ! »

languages.text: {n}Idira lacht krächzend.{/n} "Ha! Das ist das erste Mal, dass ich jemanden auf diesem Schiff so mit der kleinen Schwester sprechen höre!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I've seen anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lacht krächzend.{/n} "Ha! Das ist das erste Mal, dass ich jemanden auf diesem Schiff so mit der kleinen Schwester sprechen höre!"

languages.text: {n}İdira, kaba ve boğuk bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Aha! Şu gemide minik rahibemizle böyle konuşanını da ilk defa görüyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lets out a croaking laugh.{/n} "Ha! First time I've seen anybody on this ship talk to the little sister like that!"
